verses.verse: Go <S%G33><s%> to now, <S%G3568><s%> you rich <S%G4145><s%> men, weep <S%G2799><s%> and howl <S%G3649><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> miseries <S%G5004><s%> that shall come <S%G1904><s%> on you.
Your <S%G5216><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> are corrupted, <S%G4595><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> are moth-eaten. <S%G4598><s%>

Your <S%G5216><s%> gold <S%G5557><s%> and silver <S%G696><s%> is corroded; <S%G2728><s%> and the rust <S%G2447><s%> of them shall be a witness <S%G3142><s%> against you, and shall eat <S%G5315><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> as it were fire. <S%G4442><s%> You have <S%G2192><s%> heaped <S%G2343><s%> treasure <S%G2343><s%> together for the last <S%G2078><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the hire <S%G3408><s%> of the laborers <S%G2040><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> reaped <S%G270><s%> down your <S%G5216><s%> fields, <S%G5561><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of you kept <S%G650><s%> back <S%G650><s%> by fraud, <S%G650><s%> cries: <S%G2896><s%> and the cries <S%G995><s%> of them which have <S%G2192><s%> reaped <S%G2325><s%> are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of sabaoth. <S%G4519><s%>

You have lived <S%G5171><s%> in pleasure <S%G5171><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and been wanton; <S%G4684><s%> you have nourished <S%G5142><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> as in a day <S%G2250><s%> of slaughter. <S%G4967><s%>
You have condemned <S%G2613><s%> and killed <S%G5407><s%> the just; <S%G1342><s%> and he does not resist <S%G498><s%> you.

Be patient <S%G3114><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> to the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the farmer <S%G1092><s%> waits <S%G1551><s%> for the precious <S%G5093><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and has long <S%G3114><s%> patience <S%G3114><s%> for it, until <S%G2193><s%> he receive <S%G2983><s%> the early <S%G4406><s%> and latter <S%G3797><s%> rain. <S%G5205><s%>
Be you also <S%G2532><s%> patient; <S%G3114><s%> establish <S%G4741><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> for the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> draws near. <S%G1448><s%>

Grudge <S%G4727><s%> not one <S%G240><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be condemned: <S%G2632><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the judge <S%G2923><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the door. <S%G2374><s%>

Take, <S%G2983><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for an example <S%G5262><s%> of suffering <S%G2552><s%> affliction, <S%G2552><s%> and of patience. <S%G3115><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we count <S%G3106><s%> them happy <S%G3106><s%> which endure. <S%G5278><s%> You have heard <S%G191><s%> of the patience <S%G5281><s%> of Job, <S%G2492><s%> and have seen <S%G1492><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is very <S%G4184><s%> pitiful, <S%G4184><s%> and of tender <S%G3629><s%> mercy. <S%G3629><s%>

But above <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, my brothers, <S%G80><s%> swear <S%G3660><s%> not, neither <S%G3383><s%> by heaven, <S%G3772><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> by the earth, <S%G1093><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> by any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G243><s%> oath: <S%G3727><s%> but let your <S%G5216><s%> yes <S%G3483><s%> be yes; <S%G3483><s%> and your <S%G3588><s%> no, <S%G3756><s%> no; <S%G3756><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G5259><s%> condemnation. <S%G5272><s%>
Is any <S%G5100><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you afflicted? <S%G2553><s%> let him pray. <S%G4336><s%> Is any <S%G5100><s%> merry? <S%G2114><s%> let him sing <S%G5567><s%> psalms. <S%G5567><s%>

Is any <S%G5100><s%> sick <S%G770><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you? let him call <S%G4341><s%> for the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the church; <S%G1577><s%> and let them pray <S%G4336><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> him, anointing <S%G218><s%> him with oil <S%G1637><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

And the prayer <S%G2171><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> the sick, <S%G2577><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall raise <S%G1453><s%> him up; and if he have committed <S%G4160><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> they shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him.

Confess <S%G1843><s%> your <S%G3588><s%> faults <S%G3900><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> and pray <S%G2172><s%> one <S%G240><s%> for another, <S%G240><s%> that you may be healed. <S%G2390><s%> The effectual <S%G1754><s%> fervent prayer <S%G1162><s%> of a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man avails <S%G2480><s%> much. <S%G4183><s%>

Elias <S%G2243><s%> was a man <S%G444><s%> subject <S%G3663><s%> to like <S%G3663><s%> passions <S%G3663><s%> as we are, and he prayed <S%G4336><s%> earnestly <S%G4335><s%> that it might not rain: <S%G1026><s%> and it rained <S%G1026><s%> not on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> by the space of three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G1763><s%> and six <S%G1803><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And he prayed <S%G4336><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and the heaven <S%G3772><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> rain, <S%G5205><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> brought <S%G985><s%> forth <S%G985><s%> her fruit. <S%G2590><s%>
Brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> of you do err <S%G4105><s%> from the truth, <S%G225><s%> and one <S%G5100><s%> convert <S%G1994><s%> him;

Let him know, <S%G1097><s%> that he which converts <S%G1994><s%> the sinner <S%G268><s%> from the error <S%G4106><s%> of his way <S%G3598><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> a soul <S%G5590><s%> from death, <S%G2288><s%> and shall hide <S%G2572><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>
